description:
Description


A lightweight yet bold water-type blur tint designed to deliver a soft-focus filter effect with a comfortable, airy finish. BRAVE’s iconic heart-shaped tip allows for precise, buildable application, creating everything from natural MLBB looks to full-volume gradient lips. With 10 romantic shades inspired by different moods of love, this tint instantly blends and blurs onto lips like a dream, leaving behind a vibrant yet soft matte stain that lasts all day.

Texture: Thin water-based formula with a blurring velvet finish

Finish: Semi-matte with a soft diffused edge

Best For: Those who want a featherlight feel with strong color payoff and a hydrating soft-blur effect
 
How To Use

Use the heart-shaped applicator to apply a small amount to the center of the lips.

Blend outward for a natural gradient look or apply across the entire lips for a bold statement.

Build additional layers to intensify color or volume as desired.

02. Apply a suitable amount then press your lips together 2 – 3 times.

description:
Description

The moisture tint expresses sweet color like ice cream as it refreshingly melts into the lips


Suggested Use

1.Adjust the amount of product on the tip of the applicator before use.
2.Apply from the inner lip and spread to the outer lip line to create a gradation.



Active Ingredients

WATER, GLYCERYL POLYMETHACRYLATE, GLYCERIN, PROPANEDIOL, TREHALOSE,
PENTYLENE GLYCOL, AMMONIUM ACRYLOYLDIMETHYLTAURATE/VP COPOLYMER, POLYSORBATE 20, TITANIUM DIOXIDE (CI 77891),
TROMETHAMINE, POLYACRYLATE-13, POLYISOBUTENE, DEHYDROACETIC ACID, FRAGRANCE, SAPINDUS TRIFOLIATUS FRUIT EXTRACT,
YELLOW 6 (CI 15985), RED 33 (CI 17200), SILICA, ALUMINA, RED 27 (CI 45410), BLUE 1 (CI 42090)
